attributes.additional_details:
Sir
Name:Syed Faghurudeen
Father Name: Mohamed Ali
Date of Birth:01/05/1978
Place of British passport application: Singapore
Date of application: 20/June/2013
HM passport Office Ref:OCC/14/932

My cousin's application was falsely handled and refused by HM passport office which stated that the parent's marriage is not possible to verify by Indian Government. but he received the confirmation from Parliamentary Unit that it is possible to verify and accept for passport application.

while he informed to HM passport office,it again refused by giving the same reason.

I humbly request your highness to please do the needful and favorable action inorder to issue the British passport.

I shall be grateful to you forever.

rejection.details: E-petitions cannot be used to raise personal issues.
